cause.description:
The U-18 Movement is a grassroots organization founded to attain voting rights for the high school demographic. We also support other youth rights issues including getting students involved in the political issues of today and abolishing curfews. U-18 Links: http://www.myspace.com/joinyra http://u.18movement.googlepages.com
1. People aged 14-17 should be able to vote.
2. Curfews need to be abolished.
3. Students need to have a bigger role in national politics.
cause.name: U-18 Movement
